channel.title: Being one of the Top 3 players
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Being one of the Top 3 players" - Via Storm Menu

item.title: Re: Being one of the Top 3 players
item.content:encoded: Oh, well that makes sense :D thank you!

item.title: Re: Being one of the Top 3 players
item.content:encoded:
For Out On Top, you need to be #1, and not only part of the top three for the day. So you need to do it yourself, get maximum Ranking XP in a Season or a Rank, then loop.

But, if you are wondering for the 2 B A Master quest, you do it the same day you activate the ability since it emulate you being currently in the top three ranking for the day, thus passing that check on that mission.

item.title: Being one of the Top 3 players
item.content:encoded: Suppose I get enough Storm Points in order to be considered one of the Top 3 Players. Which day do I loop in order to get the Out On Top theme?
